examples.example: 我一直以为只要努力就能实现梦想。

translate.english: I always thought that as long as one works hard, one can realize the dream.

examples.example: 我以为只要保持乐观向上的心态，生活就会充满阳光和快乐。

translate.english: I thought that as long as I maintained an optimistic and upward mindset, life would be filled with sunshine and happiness.

examples.example: 我以为只要坚持不懈地追求，就一定能收获成功的喜悦。

translate.english: I thought that as long as I persevered in pursuing, I would definitely be able to reap the joy of success.
